faqs.a1: RawCut is your personal app to keep track of the movies and series you have watched, discover new titles, and share recommendations directly with your friends.
faqs.q2: How do I add a movie to my lists?
faqs.a2: Search for any movie or series on the Home tab. By selecting it, you will see options to add it to "Favorites" or your "Watchlist" by tapping the buttons under the poster.
faqs.q3: How do I recommend a movie to my friends?
faqs.a3: On the details screen of any title, press the "Recommend" button. A screen will open where you can search for your friends by their username, write a message, and send them the recommendation. They will receive it in their "For you" tab.
faqs.q4: Can I watch movies directly in the app?
faqs.a4: No, RawCut works as a personal diary and recommender. We use the TMDb API to give you all the information and metadata of titles, but we do not provide streaming services.
faqs.q5: Why don't I see movies in my language?
faqs.a5: If a movie or series does not have an official translation in the global TMDb database, its original title and synopsis will be shown.
faqs.q6: How do I change my generic username?
faqs.a6: Go to the "Profile" tab. In the "Profile Information" section, press the edit button next to your username to customize it.
faqs.q7: How do I delete my account?
faqs.a7: You can permanently delete your account and all its data from the "Profile" tab, scrolling down to the "Account" section and selecting "Delete account".

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.p1: At RawCut, we value and respect your privacy. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our mobile application.
privacy.s1Text: We collect information you provide directly to us when you create an account, such as your email address, username (optional), and password. We also collect data about your use of the application, such as the movies and series you add to your favorite lists, your viewing progress, and your recommendations.
privacy.s2Text: We use your personal information solely to provide and improve RawCut's services. This includes authenticating your account, syncing your lists across devices, and enabling social features such as user recommendations.
privacy.s3Text: All personal information (including account credentials, lists, and progress) is securely stored using Supabase, a secure third-party database platform. Your passwords are encrypted by Supabase and are not accessible to us.
privacy.s4Text: RawCut uses the TMDb (The Movie Database) Application Programming Interface (API) to obtain information about movies, series, and related images. We do not share your personal information with TMDb. Your use of the information provided by TMDb is subject to their own terms and policies.
privacy.s5Text: You have complete control over your data. You can delete your account and all information associated with it (including playlists and recommendations) at any time from the "Account" section in the Profile tab.
privacy.s6Text: We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally to reflect changes in our practices. We will notify you of any material updates within the application.
